'''The Endeavor''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Fatteh]] with [[Kaveh]]. The [[recipe]] for Fatteh is obtainable from [[Lambad]] at [[Lambad's Tavern]] for {{Item|Mora|20|x=2,500}}.

'''The Endeavor''' revives and restores '''15'''% of Max HP and an additional '''550''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
